import Mathlib

theorem tsum_abs_geometric {z : ℂ} (hz : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  ∑' n : ℕ, (Complex.abs z) ^ (n + 1) = Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z) := by sorry

args.query: tendsto_sum_geometric tsum_geometric_of_abs_lt_1 complex abs geometric series tsum (abs z)^(n) = abs z/(1-abs z)
